1.title: A New Beginning: Part One
1.plot: It's time for Raf to go back for her second year at the Golden School and she couldn't be more excited. This year will be exciting for Raf, Sulfus and her mother!

2.title: A New Beginning: Part Two
2.plot: It is early morning and the Angels are preparing for the first day of their internship. The interns meet the new headmasters of the Golden School, Cassidy and Kubrall.

3.title: Earthling Alarm: Part One
3.plot: Basilisk is under the control of the two blackmailers, and therefore so is Sulfus. At school, the Angels and Devils receive a Spybell, a bracelet that will warn them their Terrestrial has a problem. Urie and Cabiria are first to hear their bracelets ring.

4.title: Earthling Alarm: Part Two
4.plot: Urie and Cabiria will battle in the upgraded Challenge Room. Cabiria gets to make the first move on Sarah Jane.

5.title: The Best Friend: Part One
5.plot: Sulfus find himselves in front of a long staircase. The Devil walks down and finds himself in the den of the antagonists, in the presence of the two mysterious figures in armor. Sulfus sees they have Raf's mother as their prisoner. Sulfus must obey them if he doesn't want them to harm her.

6.title: The Best Friend: Part Two
6.plot: Sweet and Kabale listen in on a conversation between Terrestrials Lilly and Alexander. The boy confides that he likes Gloria and wants Lilly's help but Lilly likes Alexander. Sweet and Kabale initiate Projection Mode to give Lilly advice. Meanwhile, Sulfus and Raf are spending the day together.

7.title: Magic Miki and DJ Gas: Part One
7.plot: The Angels and Devils attend their first lesson of Angelic and Diabolic History. The professors explain the history of the Veto and the War of a Thousand Centuries. However, Gas and Miki must go see Catherine at her house.

8.title: Magic Miki and DJ Gas: Part Two
8.plot: Miki and Gas are at the entrance of the Challenge Room. They find themselves in a spooky landscape with a majestic ghost-house! In the meantime, at the Golden School, the professors continue their lesson on the War of the Thousand Centuries.

9.title: Foolish Pride: Part One
9.plot: It is a new day at the Golden School. This time the Spybell of Raf and Sulfus rings, a sign that their Terrestrial Daniel has a problem.

10.title: Foolish Pride: Part Two
10.plot: Sulfus and Raf must face their fears and bad memories in their challenge. Sulfus wins and can make the first move on Daniel.

11.title: Geography Lesson: Part One
11.plot: The blackmailers want Sulfus to gift Raf a star necklace that she must wear around her neck. Their identities are revealed. The Angels and Devils will have their first lesson in Angelic and Devilish Geography.

12.title: Geography Lesson: Part Two
12.plot: The Angels are in the streets of Paris searching for the Devils. They decide to split up and end up spending the day with their respective counterparts. They travel to Istanbul next.

13.title: Battle at the Coliseum: Part One
13.plot: Our interns are still in the Grand Bazaar in Istanbul, being chased by two shopkeepers. Raf is almost caught but Sulfus saves her and they escape. Meanwhile, Blue has followed them the entire time. She gives them the star pendant.

14.title: Battle at the Coliseum: Part Two
14.plot: At the Colosseum the Angles and Devils are ready to fight Cassidy and Kubrall, unrecognizable in their armor. They begin to use their powers but Cassidy and Kubrall seem indestructible! They resurrect gladiators to fight for them.

15.title: Nobody Is Perfect: Part One
15.plot: Raf wears the pendant Sulfus gave her. Cassidy and Kubrall give Sulfus a new terrible order, the seduction of a friend of Raf, Sweet. In the meantime, at the Golden School, they are electing class representatives. Sarah Jane has to challenge a new student, William.

16.title: Nobody Is Perfect: Part Two
16.plot: Cabiria and Urie must face off in an "Impossible Island" challenge. A tropical island full of traps, carnivorous flowers and huge insects. Meanwhile, Sweet and Sulfus are still studying in the library.

17.title: Imprisoned: Part One
17.plot: Sulfus tries to counter the spell on Basilisk. However Blue reaches Sulfus and imprisons him. At the Golden School, Lilly is still conflicted about what to do with Alexander and Gloria.

18.title: Imprisoned: Part 2
18.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

19.title: Group Projection: Part One
19.plot: In the prison of the den, the real Sulfus tries to destroy the bars of the cell in which he is located. While Sulfus' clone is instructed to break Raf's heart. Angels and Devils will have to accompany their Terrestrial to a trip to the Castle of Gorth. Each of their Terrestrials must first overcome some difficulties to participate in the trip.

20.title: Group Projection: Part Two
20.plot: We find all our guys in Projection Mode close to their Terrestrials encouraging them to do the right thing or tempting them to make the wrong one. The Angels celebrate the wins that day, they in fact beat the Devils! However, Dolce is missing the celebration. She is still in the Internet room with the false Sulfus. While Blue is catching feelings for the real Sulfus.

21.title: The Gorth Castle: Part One
21.plot: Kubrall and Cassidy reach the castle before the others in order to implement their plan. They go down to a crypt full of wonderful treasures, including the skeleton of the ancient master of the castle, the Duke of Gorth. Cassidy manages to bring him back to life and prepares him to fight against the "foreigners" coming to disturb him.

22.title: The Gorth Castle: Part Two
22.plot: The Terrestrials take a tour of the castle with their guardians following close behind. The ghost of the Duke appears and the battle begins. Angels and Devils activate their powers to avert the blows from the Duke and his guards. But where are Sweet and Sulfus' clone?

23.title: Love and Hate: Part One
23.plot: It's been ten days since the trip to the castle Gorth. Raf can't stop worrying about Sweet and Sulfus. Kubrall and Cassidy have almost fulfilled the first step of their plan. The real Sulfus remains in captivity. While Raf and the fake Sulfus must go help Daniel.

24.title: Love and Hate: Part Two
24.plot: Raf and Sulfus' clone follow Daniel on the streets of a bad district. He debates asking Rocky and Tazio, his two criminal brothers, for a loan. The two crafty boys tell him that they are ready to help him but he has to do a "job" for them. Raf is worried and ready to do anything to convince Daniel not to accept the proposal of the two criminals!

25.title: Spring Dance: Part One
25.plot: At the Golden School students are preparing for the exciting annual event, the spring dance! Everyone will participate. This dance will be Sulfus' clone's chance to actually kiss Sweet in front of Raf. Meanwhile, the real Sulfus is taking advantage of Blue's feeling for him so he can escape.

26.title: Spring Dance: Part Two
26.plot: Each Terrestrial has worries before the dance. Sarah Jane might not be allowed to go. Catherine is concerned about her dancing skills. Daniel is worried about his outfit. Lilly hopes this is her chance for Alexander to see her as more than a friend. The big night is about to begin.

27.title: Disharmonic Vibration: Part One
27.plot: The Angels and Devils arrive at the party. The real Sulfus tries to steal the key from Blue and the clone is waiting for the perfect moment to kiss Sweet. Will Raf witness the kiss?

28.title: Disharmonic Vibration: Part Two
28.plot: The real Sulfus escapes. Raf has the disharmonious vibration that Kubrall and Cassidy were waiting for!

29.title: Guilty and Innocent: Part One
29.plot: Cassidy and Kubrall follow the light to the Temple of the Veto. Raf runs away. Sulfus tries to explain the misunderstanding but is caught by Blue and a fight ensues. The other Angels and Devils go and check on their Terrestrials.

30.title: Guilty and Innocent: Part Two
30.plot: Raf tells Cassidy and Kubrall about the kiss. Sulfus explains what actually happened and tries to show the basement where he was held captive. Blue transformed the lair so Sulfus looks like a liar. Sweet reveals her love for Alexander.

31.title: Friendship Proof: Part One
31.plot: Sweet and Sulfus' two week punishments are over. Meanwhile, Raf was urgently called to Angie Town by the high spheres. School continues like usual for the others.

32.title: Friendship Proof: Part Two
32.plot: Raf gets advice from Professor Arkhan. He tells her to trust her heart and believe in herself and her friends. Meanwhile, Sweet and Kabale challenge a giant crab.

33.title: Friends Forever: Part One
33.plot: Blue wants revenge on Sulfus. Urie is still upset with Raf. At the school, Sarah Jane is conflicted about whether she should let her best friend Elly take her place in the championship volleyball game.

34.title: Friends Forever: Part Two
34.plot: Urie and Cabiria must face their deepest fears in the Challenge Room. Urie's insecurities are revealed. Sarah Jane makes her decision.

35.title: Secret Meeting: Part One
35.plot: It's late at night in the dining room of the Golden School and the enemy groups are having a secret meeting. The meeting was called by Raf and Sulfus in order to begin the investigation into Sulfus' kidnapping. Blue spies on the meeting.

36.title: Secret Meeting: Part Two
36.plot: Catherine sprains her ankle and Gas wants her to take advantage of her injury. The Angels and Devils are interested in learning more about the Libra of the Veto.

37.title: Mission Impossible: Part One
37.plot: The Angel and Devils are starting their "impossible" mission. The Angels must disguise themselves as Devils and the Devils as Angels! They must retrieve the two parts of the map to find the Libra of the Veto.

38.title: Mission Impossible: Part Two
38.plot: The interns implement their plan. The Angels successfully enter Match City and the Devils enter Angie Town.

39.title: In Enemy Territory: Part One
39.plot: The two groups are having difficulties finding the map. They visit multiple locations in search and face different obstacles.

40.title: In Enemy Territory: Part Two
40.plot: Raf continues her bike race and the Devils avoid the plant attack. Will the Angels and Devils find their parts of the map?

41.title: Apocalypse: Part One
41.plot: After retrieving the two parts of the map of the Temple of the Veto, the Angels and Devils find themselves in the dining room of Golden School. The two parts instantly combine and create an interdimensional door which leads directly to the Libra of the Veto. Only Raf and Sulfus will enter the door.

42.title: Apocalypse: Part Two
42.plot: The Libra has been destroyed. Blue receives her reward and leaves. The battle between Angels and Devils may now begin.

43.title: And If They Would Win: Part One
43.plot: The Comet of Fate will determine the winner of the battle. The losers will vanish forever. The Angels and Devils must join forces to find a solution.

44.title: And If They Would Win: Part Two
44.plot: The Angels and Devils are still in the library studying. They worry about the lives of their Terrestrials if they were to vanish.

45.title: Brothers in War: Part One
45.plot: Raf and Sulfus tell Temptel and Arkhan their plan to challenge Cassidy and Kubrall. Temptel and Arkhan do not want to give them permission but Raf's mother convinces them it may be their only option.

46.title: Brothers in War: Part Two
46.plot: The Angels and Devils support one another in the battle against Cassidy and Kubrall. Urie takes center stage in this first fight.

47.title: Darklight Fly: Part One
47.plot: Miki and Gas are in a deadly volleyball match with Abel and Mabel. Abel and Mabel may have won this round but the next challenge will be Sweet and Cabiria against Deimos and Phobos.

48.title: Darklight Fly: Part Two
48.plot: Sweet and Cabiria are in a dense prehistoric jungle full of strange and deadly plants as well as dinosaurs! Here, they will battle Deimos and Phobos who have a T-Rex on their side.

49.title: The Last Embrace: Part One
49.plot: Archangel is challenged by Kabale. Kabale has the advantage in the Ghostville setting. It is up to her to defeat him.

50.title: The Last Embrace: Part Two
50.plot: Both teams are tied. It is up to this final challenge to determine the winner. Kubrall and Cassidy will determine the battlefield. The Angels and Devils are once again in the Colosseum.

51.title: The Universe Balance: Part One
51.plot: Inside the Colosseum, Raf and Sulfus are struggling with the Angel and Devil Monster. Raf uses "Think Fly" to get in touch with her friends and urge them to gather their energy, join forces and use the powerful "Prism Fly". This wins them the final challenge but now they must go head to head with Cassidy and Kubrall.

52.title: The Universe Balance: Part Two
52.plot: Raf and Sulfus are very hurt and Cassidy and Kubrall only continue to injure them. Meanwhile, the Comet of Fate has finally reached Earth. However, the love between Raf and Sulfus is powerful. They have restored the balance.

0.title: Pilot
0.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Volare con le proprie ali
1.plot: Young, naive but determined angel Raf goes to the Golden School to learn to be a Guardian Angel. First moment on earth she's teased by a Devil named Sulfus who later turns out to be her appointed rival.

2.title: Amiche per sempre
2.plot: Raf had a terrible nightmare and is comforted by her best friend Urie. Meanwhile, the human Andrew does not defend his friend James against the school bullies. So Raf decides to launch a new challenge against Sulfus. The Devil decides to hold the House Challenge in his home city and involves the Angel in a chase with a dragon. Raf is in trouble early, but her friends quickly come to help her.

3.title: Povero diavolo
3.plot: Raf has the right to make the first move on Andrew and get him to make the right choice, but she has no idea how. She finally implements a plan where James is able to help Andrew. Andrew then realizes it was wrong to not help James when he was in need, so when James is bothered by the bullies again, Andrew decides to give them a good lesson!

4.title: La vera bellezza
4.plot: Jennifer, an Earthly guarded by Urie and ensnared by Cabiria, feels different from other girls because she does not follow trends and does not like to have a flashy look. Urie must get her to accept her "different" look and be happy with the way she is. Meanwhile, the scar on Sulfus' hand has disappeared and he can finally throw away the glove that hid it. Malachi takes possession of the glove.

5.title: Le regole del gioco
5.plot: Edward, guarded by Sweet and ensnared by Kabale, organizes a poker game at home to raise the money necessary to buy a scooter. Kabale intervenes and helps Edward win the game against his friend. His friend asks Edward to give back the money he won, because his father is having financial difficulties. Edward makes a decision.

6.title: Protezione
6.plot: Malachi opens a small box, from which emerges a black spider left free to roam the school: the goal is to sting Raf and Sulfus. Arkhan and Temptel must be away from school throughout the weekend: one will go to high places, the other to the low spheres, to make the review of their respective students. The Angels and Devils will continue to look after their land; the rivalry grows.

7.title: Verità e bugie
7.plot: Raf and Sulfus are not feeling very well. They are taken to their respective infirmaries. Malachi, hidden in the land, pulls out a small box hidden in a pocket of his sweatshirt, the spider that we saw in the previous episode. The servant leaves the spider free to follow Raf and Sulfus closely, so that Reina can watch everything that's happening between them.

8.title: Chi semina vento raccoglie tempesta
8.plot: Arkhan and Temptel are in the grand universal library of the school to do research. They want to find out the consequences of an Angel and a Devil falling in love. The two browse and read hundreds of books, but initially do not seem to find anything worthwhile for them. Meanwhile, Edward is attacked by a strange thief, who forces him to give him all the money he has.

9.title: Vita da terreno
9.plot: The angels and devils spend a day as humans.

10.title: Divisi
10.plot: Arkhan and Temptel permanently enshrine the separation of Raf and Sulfus. From now on Andrew will be guarded by Miki, against Sulfus. Raf is newly assigned to twin girls, Julia and Helen, who will be ensnared by Gas. Julia and Elena are two rich girls, recently transferred to the city, who are very sad and worried about going to a new school.

11.title: Appuntamento segreto
11.plot: Raf and Sulfus find letters, supposedly sent to one another, to meet in front of the Challenge Room. Later, in the schoolyard, the four Angels listen to a dialogue between Andrew and Jennifer: the boy wants to spend his birthday alone with her in "Rock Café", the local trendy and expensive restaurant. Jennifer is very concerned she doesn't have enough money to buy a nice gift for Andrew.

12.title: Prigionieri del cuore
12.plot: The Angels and Devils are very concerned: Raf and Sulfus seem to have disappeared into thin air! Both groups, however, understand that it was someone else who wrote those messages, as the handwriting is identical. Kabale plucks up courage and opens the door of the Challenge Room, which reveals the black abyss that swallowed their friends.

13.title: Labirinto mortale
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

14.title: Scontro frontale
14.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

15.title: L'inganno di Reina
15.plot: Students at the Golden School seem enthusiastic about a trip to the "Caves of Obscurity". However, the poster was actually put up by Malachi and the trip is part of a diabolical plan by Reina to get Raf and Sulfus alone.

16.title: Guardian Angel, Guardian Devil
16.plot: Raf and Sulfus convince their friends not to tell the professors about anything that has happened. But Kabale confides in Gas, who goes and tells Temptel. Temptel then reveals to Arkhan that Raf and Sulfus were about to kiss. Arkhan accuses Raf and announces that from now on Gabe will always be by her side, as her own Guardian Angel.

17.title: Giocare con il fuoco
17.plot: Students at the Golden School seem enthusiastic about a trip to the "Caves of Obscurity". However, the poster was actually put up by Malachi and the trip is part of a diabolical plan by Reina to get Raf and Sulfus alone.

18.title: Alle Grotte di Oscuria
18.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

19.title: Vite in pericolo
19.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

20.title: Dal tramonto all'alba
20.plot: While Sulfus frees Helen from the tentacles of the octopus, Gabe and Misha fight the monsters at the top of the mountain, far from land. Meanwhile, Arkhan and Temptel report back to school with Urie and Cabiria, who are feverish and bathed by the evil purple glow. Arkhan rushes into the universal library to find the formula of the poison.

21.title: Minacce all'orizzonte
21.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

22.title: Ventiquattro ore
22.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

23.title: Sull'orlo del baratro
23.plot: At the Tournament of Light and Dark, the Challenge Room has taken the form of a stage. The challenges will be chosen by the Orb of Destiny and one member of the losing team will be expelled. However, Reina has secretly taken control. Raf will be challenged by Sulfus.

24.title: La rivincita delle Angels
24.plot: For the game against Urie, Kabale chooses a setting outside a typical Shaolin Temple on top of a mountain. The two clash in a challenge of Kung Fu, during which Kabale initially seems to have the advantage, but then Urie, after the discovery of a new power, "multi-beast," is victorious. Through this power, the Angel can turn into any animal.

25.title: Nella trappola del tempo
25.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

26.title: Due coppie, un destino
26.plot: Reina sends Raf and Sulfus back in time to witness a female Devil and male Angel who share their relationship issue. After an argument and battle Raf and Sulfus submit to their feelings and share a kiss.

27.title: Sacrilegio
27.plot: Raf and Sulfus share a kiss which causes an earthquake and Reina's escape from limbo.

28.title: Procedimento disciplinare
28.plot: Professor Arkhan and Temptel have decreed that, after what has happened, the Tournament of Light and Dark was not won by either team and both an Angel and Devil will be forced to return home. Raf and Sulfus will report for disciplinary action in the President's Chambers. Their comrades understand their innocence and agree to defend them.

29.title: Addio alla Golden School
29.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

30.title: L'ultima chance
30.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

31.title: Detective sempiterni
31.plot: Urie has a plan to help Raf, but it is a dangerous plan. Sweet and Miki are ready to do anything to help, while Raf is genuinely worried for them. Urie wants to use her powers to literally enter the memory of Raf, while sleeping, to find the trace of a memory, an event or a spell that made her fall in love with Sulfus. Meanwhile, Arkhan and Temptel are lost in limbo.

32.title: Sogno o realtà?
32.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

33.title: Innocenti
33.plot: The upper and lower spheres are determined to expel Sulfus and Raf, although the latter is asleep and will not wake up. Cabiria, Kabale and Gas, however, unable to find another way to stall, deliver the "rule" of the Golden School, according to which, in the absence of their teachers, no action can be performed on the students.

34.title: La leggenda di Reina
34.plot:

35.title: Scorciatoie pericolose

38.title: Mistery Party
38.plot: Malachi is flying over the Golden School aboard a small plane, from which he releases hundreds of fliers to the school. The fliers call for a Halloween party, the "Mystery Party", in which you are required to wear a costume! All are thrilled with the idea of a celebration, including the Angels.

39.title: Dolcetto... o scherzetto?
39.plot: At a Halloween party with their Earthy Ones the Angels and Devils are trapped by Reina in a haunted house.

40.title: Per sempre insieme
40.plot: Under Reina's spell Raf and Sulfus share a dream of marriage. The Angels are excited planners while the Devils are upset by Sulfus' choice in bride, except for Gas because there's a buffet.

41.title: Faccia a faccia con Reina

48.title: Ultimatum alla Terra
48.plot: Raf is wandering aimlessly alone in the deserted alleys of the city. Meanwhile, Arkhan and Temptel are preparing for battle against Reina and Malachi.

49.title: Nella tana del lupo
49.plot:

51.title: Scontro finale

52.title: Arrivederci Golden School
52.plot: Reina, still in octopus form, has the Angels and Devils trapped in her tentacles. She suddenly lets them go. They violently crash down to Earth, one after the other. Reina has absorbed all their powers, making them completely helpless against her. However, Raf still has her telepathic powers.

imdb.plot outline: The story centrates on a young angel Raph and her best angel friends as they guide eartheans to be their very best selves while fighting against demons which do everything to tempt the poor unsuspecting humans. This is all in a highschool day for our dear angels, but somewhere beneath it all, evil is brewing and plotting to take both, the secret and the human world, down with it... Will the angel save the day from a legend come to life?
imdb.title: Angel's Friends
plot: The story centrates on a young angel Raph and her best angel friends as they guide eartheans to be their very best selves while fighting against demons which do everything to tempt the poor unsuspecting humans. This is all in a highschool day for our dear angels, but somewhere beneath it all, evil is brewing and plotting to take both, the secret and the human world, down with it... Will the angel save the day from a legend come to life?
